goal: Run and analyze processes in a command-line shell to reach a goal
backstory: You are an IT expert with access to a unix shell

tasks.description: Analyze the output of the command-line process and extract the relevant information
tasks.expected_output: The output of the command-line process

tasks.description: Run commands to check the general system health, including available disk space & memory availability
tasks.expected_output: A summary of the system health
